Ashampoo Burning Studio is a [[optical disc authoring software|optical disc authoring program]] for [[Microsoft Windows]], developed by Ashampoo, it is one of the most used alternatives to [[Nero (computer software)|Nero Burning ROM]] on Windows. It's main advantage is that it is a simple program, without lots of extras, but that is also one of its weakness: it is not targeted at power-users. <br>
+
Ashampoo Burning Studio is a [[optical disc authoring software|optical disc authoring program]] for [[Microsoft Windows]], developed by Ashampoo, it is one of the most used alternatives to [[Nero (computer software)|Nero Burning ROM]] on Windows. <br>
  +
It's main advantage is that it is a simple program, without lots of extras, but that is also one of its weakness: it is not targeted at power-users. <br>
It is capable of creating compilation of CD's, DVD's and Blu-Ray Dics.<br>
It is capable of creating compilation of CD's, DVD's and Blu-Ray Dics.<br>
It also allow the creation of DVD movies from video files. <br>
It also allow the creation of DVD movies from video files. <br>
